pullRequest.title: HADOOP-17407. ABFS: Fix NPE on delete idempotency flow
pullRequest.bodyText:
Delete idempotency code returns success with a dummy success HttpOperation. the calling code that checks continuation token throws NPE as the dummy success instance does not have any response headers.
In case of non-HNS account, server could return continuation token.  Dummy success response code is modified to not fail while accessing response headers.
Existing test for delete idempotency was modified to reproduce the NPE and test the fix.

commit.message: Fix NPE on delete idempotency flow

+/**

+public final class TestMockHelpers {
+
+  /**
+   * Sets a class field by reflection.
+   * @param type
+   * @param obj
+   * @param fieldName
+   * @param fieldObject
+   * @param <T>

+      Object fieldObject) throws Exception {
+

+        field = type.getDeclaredField(fieldName);
+    field.setAccessible(true);
+    java.lang.reflect.Field modifiersField = java.lang.reflect.Field.class.getDeclaredField("modifiers");
